title: Candle Snuffer and Trimmer
description: 3-footed scissor-type snuffer with scrolled handle; engraved with bright cut bands; monogram JC at side (later addition); snuffer door stamped \"Patent\"; with hinged cutter; fully marked on inside of snuffer box; maker\'s mark and lion passant on snuffer door
creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his famliy and friends
